item.title: Compiling and Release of Netview
item.description: If you haven’t caught Chris Gates (@carnal0wnage) and my talk at DerbyCon 2012 - we released 2 tools, Netview, and Ditto. Here I’ll walk you through compiling Netview yourself, in the next blog post we’ll go over compiling Ditto and how you can remove it’s icon to reduce the size if you want. But for Netview it’s pretty straight forward. First you pull a copy of the GIT repository: https://github.com/mubix/netview
